# Verify that we can test a simple corpus setup
#
# The general setup here is that we create to projects, a and b
# (which are identical, but for the directory path in which they are contained)
# Then have a third directory, corpus, that adds a and b as
# submodules

# Setup a
cd a
git init
git add -A
git commit -m 'Initial commit'
cd $WORK

# Setup b
cd b
git init
git add -A
git commit -m 'Initial commit'
cd $WORK

# Setup corpus
cd corpus
git init
git submodule add $WORK/a a
git submodule add $WORK/b b
git add -A
git commit -am 'Initial commit'
cd $WORK

# Test
cd corpus
unity test --corpus
